publications.name: Transitions and thermodynamics on species graphs of chemical reaction networks
publications.summary: This paper proposes a method to coarse-grain reaction systems and represent them as a graph structure. This method expresses the system as a graph by focusing on the conserved quantities of the system and discusses the related thermodynamic quantities and their interrelationships.
